description:
The Law Office of Peter J. Casey, LLC, protects the interests of injured people in West Hartford, Connecticut, and beyond. My mission is to help people with severe injuries - and their families -recover from these types of traumatic events.

Negotiating With Insurance Companies

Many insurance companies provide low settlement offers at first, attempting to convince injured people that the reduced amount is reasonable. My law office understands how insurance adjusters work, and I am ready to negotiate in order to make our clients whole.

Issues typically become more complicated once someone accepts an offer. I would urge anyone considering this type of deal to understand the entire situation before making any type of agreement.

Taking Matters To Court

If insurers do not see reason during negotiations, or if clients come to us further along in the process, I am able to litigate personal injury cases. In fact, one of the reasons I have been such a successful negotiator is that I prepare cases for trial from the beginning.

Providing Compassionate Counsel

At the Law Office of Peter J. Casey, LLC, clients come first. I respond quickly, communicate clearly and provide a compassionate legal point of view on these life-changing losses. In addition to our personal injury practice, which includes car accidents and other disasters, and also handle matters of probate litigation and estate administration. Free consultations are available.
